content.title: ??? (The Lich)
content.body:
All my work! All my fighting! All my race! I can't let them down… I can't let them down.

    The Lich, it is too powerful… I tried killing it, but after a while, it stopped feeling pain, it stopped being pierced!
    
    It has to be that lantern, that damn lantern! It appeared out of nowhere, nowhere! I swear, it has to be that! Maybe, if I destroy it, I may have finally hurt it once more, but it is far too late for me, far too late!
    
    My work! My fight! My effort! It can't be in vane… it can't be ḯ̷͚͊̔̌n ----- ---
